verses.name: Luke 20:24
verses.text: Shew me a penny. Whose image and superscription hath it? They answered and said, Cesar’s.

verses.name: Luke 20:25
verses.text: And he said unto them, Render therefore unto Cesar the things which be Cesar’s, and unto God the things which be God’s.

verses.name: Luke 20:26
verses.text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people: and they marvelled at his answer, and held their peace.

verses.name: Luke 20:27
verses.text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees, which deny that there is any resurrection; and they asked him,
